title: Kaira calls on PML-Q Chief to inquire his health
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 20 (APP): Adviser to Prime Minister on Kashmir Affairs and Gilgit-Baltistan Qamar Zaman Kaira called on PML-Q Chief Chaudhary Shujaat Hussain.
Qamar Zaman Kaira inquired about the health of Chaudhry Shujaat Hussain, said a press release.
Moreover, the press release also stated that both leaders discussed the current political situation of the country.
Meanwhile, PML-Q Chief congratulated Qamar Zaman Kaira on taking over the portfolio of Adviser to PM on Kashmir Affairs and Gilgit-Baltistan.
Federal Minister Chaudhry Salik Hussain was also present in the meeting.
